Claude API Module

This module provides functionality for interacting with the Claude AI API.

It includes functions for loading configurations, constructing prompts, sending requests to the Claude API, and managing message history.

async twitch_claude_bot.claude_api.get_claude_response(prompt: str, persona: str = 'claude_the_wizard') → str[source]

Parameters:

  • prompt (str) – The user’s input prompt.

  • persona (str, optional) – The persona to use for the response. Defaults to ‘claude_the_wizard’.

Returns:

Return type:

str
